main event: Three brilliant, bright, yellowish objects were sighted in the sky over Connersville, Indiana on July 21, 1965.
interesting points: The objects were initially stationary, then suddenly made a 90-degree turn and shot away at high speed.
The objects were described as silent and appearing brighter than the sun.
The witness estimated the objects were traveling around 500 mph and were about 1-2 miles away.
No physical evidence or photographs were reported.
